summary: Tested two new features: 1) Enhanced Generated History UI with search, status filter, and sort order filters - all working correctly. 2) Estate Planning Complete All button - working on both ClientsPage side panel and EstatePlanningDetail page.
passed_tests: Feature 1: Generated History - Search filter input is present and functional
Feature 1: Generated History - Status filter dropdown shows 'All Status', 'Success', 'Failed' options
Feature 1: Generated History - Sort order dropdown shows 'Newest First', 'Oldest First' options
Feature 1: Generated History - Sort order changes document order (verified oldest first shows Feb 1 before Feb 2)
Feature 1: Generated History - Results count badge updates based on filters
Feature 2: Complete All button visible in ClientsPage side panel for Estate Planning cases
Feature 2: Complete All button (labeled 'All' with checkmark icon) works in ClientsPage side panel
Feature 2: Clicking 'All' button marks all incomplete tasks as Done/Yes - Mary Curran 0% -> 100%
Feature 2: Success toast shows 'Completed 7 tasks!' after clicking Complete All
Feature 2: Complete All button visible in EstatePlanningDetail page task tracker
Feature 2: Complete All button works in EstatePlanningDetail page - Kevin Price 29% -> 100%
Feature 2: Success toast shows 'Completed 5 tasks!' on detail page
Feature 2: Progress persists after page refresh
critical_code_review_comments: Generated History filters implemented correctly with state management (historyFilter, historySearch, historySortOrder)
Filter logic properly filters documents by search text (doc.log), status (SUCCESS/failed), and sorts by created_at
Complete All button in ClientsPage uses handleCompleteAllTasks function that updates all incomplete tasks in a single API call
Complete All button in EstatePlanningDetail uses same pattern with handleCompleteAllTasks
Both implementations correctly identify incomplete tasks and set them to their respective completed values (Done/Yes)
UI properly shows loading state (completingAllTasks) and success toast after completion
seed_data_creation: Used existing clients: Mary Curran (0% progress) and Kevin Price (29% progress) for testing Complete All functionality
context_for_next_testing_agent: Both requested features are fully implemented and working: 1) Generated History UI has search, status filter, and sort order filters. 2) Complete All button works on both ClientsPage side panel (shows as 'All' button) and EstatePlanningDetail page (shows as 'Complete All' button). Note: Mary Curran and Kevin Price now have 100% task completion after testing.

generated_history_filters.search_filter: PASS - Filters documents by template/client name in doc.log field
generated_history_filters.status_filter: PASS - Dropdown with All Status/Success/Failed options
generated_history_filters.sort_order: PASS - Dropdown with Newest First/Oldest First options, correctly sorts by created_at

complete_all_button.clients_page_side_panel: PASS - Button labeled 'All' with checkmark icon, marks all tasks as Done/Yes
complete_all_button.estate_planning_detail_page: PASS - Button labeled 'Complete All' with checkmark icon, marks all tasks as Done/Yes
complete_all_button.api_integration: PASS - Uses masterListApi.update to update all tasks in single API call
complete_all_button.toast_notification: PASS - Shows 'Completed X tasks!' success message
